title: Reconnect
body:
I played a game more then a hpur ago. Still the match ended i gettng the reconnect srceen and i cant do anything. when i reconnecting the gme is crashing.
Help me pls.

replies.body: It sounds like you experienced a ghost game issue, meaning that the match could not communicate it ended to our servers.  Usually relogging can fix this, otherwise you may need to wait about an hour to force that communication.  Hopefully, everything is okay now!
